h.Description: Show a help info for a single command, or DMs you if no parameters are specified.

modules.Description: Show a list with all modules.

commands.Description: Show a list with all commands of a module.

allcommands.Description: Show a list with all commands.

kick.Description: Kick an user. If you provide a reason message the bot will DM the user with the reason.

ban.Description: Ban an user. If you provide a reason message the bot will DM the user with the reason.

softban.Description: Ban an user, remove his messages from last 7 days, and then unban it.

pruneban.Description: Ban an user, remove his messages from last 7 days. Different from "softban" where the user is unbanned.

mute.Description: Mute an user from text and voice channels. You can mute temporaly: months(mo), weeks(w), days(d), hours(h), minutes(m).

unmute.Description: Unmute an user from text and voice channels.

setmute.Description: Set the mute role. If the role doesn't exists it will be created.

greet.Description: Toggle announcements on the current channel when someone joins the server.

greetmessage.Description:
Set the announcement message when someone joins the server.
Placeholders:
`%user%` - will mention the user who joins
`%server%` or `%guild%` - will put the name of the server
Embeds are supported, json form: soon a site for it.

bye.Description: Toggle announcements on the current channel when someone leaves the server.

byemessage.Description:
Set the announcement message when someone leaves the server.
Placeholders:
`%user%` will mention the user who leaves
`%server%` or `%guild%` - will put the name of the server
Embeds are supported, json form: soon a site for it.

modlog.Description: Set the current channel as "mod-log" channel where the bot will post notifications about mute, unmute, kick, ban, softban. Provide no parameters to disable it from the current channel.

activity.Description: Sets the bot's activity status to `Playing`, `Listening to` or `Watching`

activityrotate.Description: Sets the bot's activity status rotation.
Remarks: [prefix]activityrotate 30 playing r!h for help \n watching anime

status.Description: Sets the bot's status to Online, Idle/AFK, DnD or Invisible`

streaming.Description: Sets the bot's activity status to streaming.

send.Description: Send a message to an user or to a channel from a server.

edit.Description: Edit a message in a guild.

dbl.Description: Show a list with voters for today from Discord Bots List.

updateimages.Description: Update images with reactions, neko and kitsune.

finduser.Description: Search an user from Discord and show it's info.

downloadusers.Description: Download all users from a guild

delete.Description: Delete an user from the database. The currency, global xp, waifus and profile settings will be erased.

db.Description: Show details about an user from the database

blacklist.Description: Add an user to the blacklist. It will cannot generate global xp and will cannot receive [currency].

removeblacklist.Description: Remove an user from the blacklist. It will can generate global xp and will can receive [currency].

botban.Description: Ban an user from using the commands. It will also be added to the blacklist.

removebotban.Description: Unban an user from using the commands. It will also be removed from the blacklist.

event.Description:
Start an event to win [currency].
Parameters: time (s), reward, maximum, differencePerUser, onlyNumbers, botStarts, message.
Remarks: [prefix]event 0 reward maximum differencePerUser onlyNumbers botStarts message (counter event)

stopevent.Description: Stop any event that is running

deletecommandmessage.Description: Toggle deletion of the user's message that triggered a command.

addemote.Description: Add an emote on this server. PNG, JPG or GIF supported. The image must be under 256 KB.

deleteemote.Description: Delete an emote from this server.

renameemote.Description: Rename an emote from this server. You need to separate the old name by the new name with '->'

rolecolor.Description: Set a color for a role.

renamerole.Description: Rename a Role. You need to separate the old name by the new name with '->'

roles.Description: Show the roles on this server. Pagination supported.

setrole.Description: Set a role for an user.

removerole.Description: Remove a role from an user.

autoassignablerole.Description: Set a role to be auto-assigned for every user who joins the server. Provide no role to deactivate it.

hoistrole.Description: Set whether or not a role should be displayed independently in the userlist.

mentionrole.Description: Set whether or not a role should be mentioned.

iam.Description: Assign to yourself a role from this server's self assignable roles list.

iamn.Description: Remove from yourself a role from this server's self assignable roles list.

addselfassignablerole.Description: Add a role in the server's self assignable roles list.

deleteselfassignablerole.Description: Delete a role from the server's self assignable roles list.

listselfassignableroles.Description: Show a list with the server's self assignable roles list.

nickname.Description: Set an user's nickname in this server. Provide no parameters to remove the nickname.

whoisplaying.Description: Show a list with all users from the server that play a game.

prune.Description:
`[prefix]prune x` removes last x number of messages from the channel (up to 100).
`[prefix]prune @User` removes all User's messages in the last 100 messages.
`[prefix]prune @Someone x` removes last x number of User's messages in the channel.

createchannel.Description: Create a text or a voice channel. The type of the channel must be specified: `text` or `voice`.

deletechannel.Description: Delete a text or a voice channel. The type of the channel must be specified: `text` or `voice`.

renamechannel.Description: Rename a channel. You need to separate the old name by the new name with '->'. The type of the channel must be specified: `text` or `voice`.

renamecategory.Description: Rename a category. You need to separate the old name by the new name with '->'.

setnsfwchannel.Description: Toggle this channel or another channel as NSFW.

warning.Description: Warn an user. Also, you can specify a reason.

warninglist.Description: Show a list with all warned users.

warninglog.Description: Show all warnings for an user.

warningclear.Description: Clear an warning from an user. Type `all` to clear all warnings.

warningpunishment.Description: Set the number of warnings for a user to be punished and the punishment method (mute, kick, ban), or 0 to disable the punishment. Provide no parameters to show the current punishment method.

award.Description: Award an user with some amount of currency.

take.Description: Take some amount of currency from an user.

give.Description: Give to an user some amount from your currency.

currency.Description: Check the currency you have or an user.

leaderboard.Description: Show a list with currencies of users.

betroll.Description: Bet on roll. Over 80 -> 1x, over 90 -> 1.5x, over 95 -> 2x, over 99 -> 5x of the bet.

wheel.Description: Bet on wheel. You can win up to 2.4x of the bet.

stats.Description: Show the stats of the bot.

userinfo.Description: Show the info for an user. Provide no parameters to show your info.

serverinfo.Description: Show the info for this server.

userid.Description: Show the ID of an user. Provide no parameters to see your ID.

channelid.Description: Show the ID of this channel.

serverid.Description: Show the ID of this server.

useravatar.Description: Show the avatar for an user. Provide no parameters to see your avatar.

servericon.Description: Show the icon of this server.

play.Description:
1. Play a song. Automatically search from YouTube using keywords or provide a link.
2. Provide a youtube playlist link to create a playlist, it will add maximum 50 songs
3. Play a song from the playlist by index.
The bot will auto-join to the voice channel.

destroy.Description: Stop the music playback and leave the voice channel.

volume.Description: Set the volume of music playback.

remove.Description: Remove a song by name or id. The name doesn't need to be full.

hentai.Description: Show a hentai image. Multiple tags allowed, separate them by space. A full tag may contains underscores.

hentaiplus.Description: Show multiple hentai images from Danbooru, Konachan and Yandere. Multiple tags allowed, separate them by space. A full tag may contains underscores.

danbooru.Description: Show a hentai image from Danbooru. Multiple tags allowed, separate them by space. A full tag may contains underscores.

konachan.Description: Show a hentai image from Konachan. Multiple tags allowed, separate them by space. A full tag may contains underscores.

rule34.Description: Show a hentai image from Rule34. Multiple tags allowed, separate them by space. A full tag may contains underscores.

anime.Description: Show info for an anime from AniList.

character.Description: Show info for a character from AniList.

animelist.Description: Show a list with anime from AniList.

youtube.Description: Search a video or a channel from youtube.

youtubelist.Description: Show a list with videos from youtube.

osu.Description: Show osu!standard stats for an osu player.

mania.Description: Show osu!mania stats for an osu player.

taiko.Description: Show osu!taiko stats for an osu player.

ctb.Description: Show osu!ctb stats for an osu player.

prefix.Description: Set the prefix on this server (Requires **Administrator**). Provide no parameters to show the current server prefix.

calcops.Description: Show all expression options for `calc` command.

det.Description: Calculate the determinant of any N x N matrix.

profile.Description: Show your profile or for an user.

backgroundimage.Description: Set the profile's background image. Only https. Direct image links, png, jpg or jpeg allowed. Price: 1000 [currency]. For better results, resize the image to 500x300. NSFW images are not allowed, if someone uses, report them to the support server and they will be banned.

backgrounddim.Description: Set the profile's background dim. Default is 50%.

invite.Description: Invite the bot to your server.

donate.Description: Support this project on Patreon. You will receive 1000 [currency] for each 1$.

choose.Description: I will choose an item from a list. Separators allowed: `,`, `|`, `;`

convertlist.Description: Show a list with all units categories the converter. Type [prefix]convertlist <category> to get the units from a category.

converter.Description: Convert from a unit to other unit. The category need to be passed. The name of the units are case-sensitive.

color.Description: Generates a preview image of a hex color.

claimwaifu.Description: Claim your waifu from anime. The price for every waifu starts from 1000 [currency] and is rising with each claim with 10 [currency], also will decrease for each divorce. The character must be on AniList database.

belovedwaifu.Description: Make a waifu primary and beloved. You can set only one waifu. The price is 5000 [currency]. The action is not reversible.

divorce.Description: Divorce from a waifu. You will receive 90% cashback.

waifus.Description: Show all your claimed waifus or for an user.

belovedwaifuavatar.Description: Set to your beloved waifu a new avatar. Only https. Direct image links, png, jpg or jpeg allowed. For better results, resize the image to 100x155.

createwaifu.Description: Create your own waifu. Put a direct link link and a name. The price is 10000 [currency]. She will have the beloved status automatically.

experience.Description: Show your global level and xp.

xpnotify.Description: Enable or disable server xp notification.

leveluprolereward.Description: Add a role in the levelup role reward list. When an user reaches the level he will be rewarded with the role. Only in servers. To remove a role provide no role for the respective level.

leveluprolerewards.Description: Show all levelup role rewards for this server.

resetguildexperience.Description: Reset the xp leaderboard from a server.

removeglobalexperience.Description: Remove global xp from an user.
